listeningQuestion.question: What special ability do the children in Los Angeles develop?
listeningQuestion.translation: 洛杉矶的孩子们发展了什么特殊能力？

editorNotes: 本课讲述了儿童早期游泳训练的情况，特别介绍了洛杉矶特殊游泳池中儿童的学习过程。文章重点描述了孩子们惊人的水下适应能力和特殊的训练方法。语法上涉及被动语态、时间状语从句等结构，以及一些重要短语的用法。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: Experiments have proved that children can be instructed in swimming at a very early age.
At a special swimming pool in Los Angeles, children become expert at holding their breath under water even before they can walk.
Babies of two months old do not appear to be reluctant to enter the water.
It is not long before they are so accustomed to swimming that they can pick up weights from the floor of the pool.
A game that is very popular with these young swimmers is the underwater tricycle race.
Tricycles are lined up on the floor of the pool seven feet under water.
The children compete against each other to reach the other end of the pool.
Many pedal their tricycles, but most of them prefer to push or drag them.
Some children can cover the whole length of the pool without coming up for breath even once.
Whether they will ever become future Olympic champions, only time will tell.
Meanwhile, they should encourage those among us who cannot swim five yards before they are gasping for air.

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 实验证明，儿童在很小的时候就可以开始学习游泳。
在洛杉矶的一个特设的游泳池里，孩子们甚至还没有学会走路时就已经能熟练地在水下屏住呼吸了。
两个月的婴儿并未显得不愿意入水。
他们很快就适应了游泳，以致能捡起池底的物品。
这些幼小的游泳运动员非常喜爱的一种游戏是水下三轮车比赛。
三轮车并排放在7英尺深的游泳池底上。
孩子们比赛看谁先到达游泳池的另一端。
很多孩子用脚蹬车，但多数孩子更愿意推或是拉着三轮车。
有些孩子能够跑完游泳池的全长而不用露出水面换气。
他们将来是否能成为奥林匹克的冠军，这只能由时间来作出回答。
与此同时，他们对我们中的那些游不了5码就已喘不过气来的人应该是种鼓舞。

notes.title: 被动语态
content: 本课使用被动语态描述儿童的游泳教学。
例如：can be instructed, are lined up等。
被动语态强调动作的承受者。

notes.title: 时间状语从句
content: 使用before引导的时间状语从句。
例如：even before they can walk
表示在某个时间点之前发生的动作。

notes.context: 用于描述暂时停止呼吸的动作
notes.example: The children become expert at holding their breath under water.

notes.context: 表示对某事物已经适应或习惯
notes.example: They are so accustomed to swimming that they can pick up weights.

notes.context: 用于描述物体或人的排列
notes.example: Tricycles are lined up on the floor of the pool.

multipleChoice.question: What game do the young swimmers enjoy?
multipleChoice.explanation: 文中提到这些幼小的游泳运动员非常喜爱水下三轮车比赛。

fillInBlanks.sentence: The children ___ against each other to reach the other end of the pool.

notes.title: 早期教育
notes.content: 本课展示了儿童早期教育的可能性，特别是在运动技能方面。文章通过游泳训练的例子，说明了儿童具有惊人的学习能力和适应能力。这种早期训练不仅培养了孩子们的运动技能，也为他们未来的发展打下了基础。
